newsitem.title: USA: G7 meeting ends, officials seen leaving.
newsitem.headline: G7 meeting ends, officials seen leaving.

text.p: The meeting of finance ministers and central bankers from Group of Seven industrial countries ended a short while ago here Sunday.
Reporters outside the U.S. Treasury, where the meeting was held, said officials were seen leaving the building.
U.S. Treasury Secretary Robert Rubin was due to hold a briefing with reporters on the discussions shortly.

First Deputy Prime Minister Anatoly Chubais told reporters waiting outside the Treasury building that the G7 had given its support to Russia's effort to join the Paris Club and the World Trade Organization.
Chubais said G7 ministers had given "a postive estimation" of the reform process in Russia.
